20101226015721.000|20101226015724.000|CC1|IN A TATTERED BLANKET, FLO HAD  
20101226015724.000|20101226015725.000|CC1|THE IDEA OF RECYCLING USED      
20101226015725.000|20101226015728.000|CC1|CLOTHES, SEWING THEM INTO SIMPLE
20101226015728.000|20101226015731.000|CC1|WARM SLEEPING BAGS.             
20101226015731.000|20101226015732.000|CC1|AND DELIVERING THEM TO THE      
20101226015732.000|20101226015733.000|CC1|NEEDY, WHENEVER THE WEATHER     
20101226015733.000|20101226015735.000|CC1|TURNS COLD.                     
20101226015735.000|20101226015737.000|CC1|>> OUR MOTTO IS TO KEEP SOMEONE 
20101226015737.000|20101226015739.000|CC1|ALIVE TONIGHT UNTIL THEY CAN    
20101226015739.000|20101226015740.000|CC1|HELP OR BE HEALED BY SOMEONE IN 
20101226015740.000|20101226015742.000|CC1|OUR SOCIETY TOMORROW.           
20101226015742.000|20101226015744.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MY BROTHER'S KEEPER
20101226015744.000|20101226015745.000|CC1|HAS TAKEN OVER THE WHEATLEY'S   
20101226015745.000|20101226015746.000|CC1|BARN.

20101226015752.000|20101226015753.000|CC1|FOLD.

20101226015754.000|20101226015756.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND FLO NOW SPENDS 
20101226015756.000|20101226015756.000|CC1|MUCH OF HER TIME HELPING OTHER

20101226015806.000|20101226015807.000|CC1|AROUND THE WORLD.

20101226015813.000|20101226015814.000|CC1|THEY'VE MADE HUNDREDS OF        
20101226015814.000|20101226015815.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF SLEEPING BAGS FOR
